meanings.definition: A class of chemical compounds containing a six-membered heterocyclic ring with two nitrogen atoms.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study piperazines to understand their chemical structures.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician identified the piperazines in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The piperazines at the party were all wearing tiny nitrogen atom hats.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, piperazines dance with two nitrogen partners.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the piperazines looked like tiny nitrogen bridges.

meanings.definition: A type of drug used as an anthelmintic or antihistamine.
meanings.sent1: Doctors prescribed piperazines to treat parasitic infections.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended piperazines for allergy relief.
meanings.sent3: The piperazines in the medicine cabinet were having a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: Her relief was like a wave after taking the piperazines.
meanings.sent5: The piperazines worked like tiny warriors fighting off invaders in the body.
